post.text: FLORIDA -- THANK YOU --- WE CAN WIN! Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Chanee
comment.text: Hello, hope all is well, I have contributed a couple times with the promise of a hat, never got the 1st one, and then got another email saying contribute and get a free hat, so I did again, still not hat, I've emailed and never got a response. I thought fine typical politician say one thing do another. It has been several months since those donations so its been plenty of time, I just thought I wouldn't donate again if you are like all the other politicians, of course I have if you check your list but not as much as I'm out of work and struggling. But just wanted to let you know my disappointment with what seems as the same old same old, tell you whatever just to get your votes, will still vote for you but disappointed in how I've been taken so far. Anyway didn't know where else to write since never heard a word back from emails. Take care and God Bless.

replies.author: George
replies.text: You are surprised that you got conned by a con-artist? Show us your Johnson 2016!!!!

replies.author: Chanee
replies.text: Nick tell George all the ways that Johnson has change, well not all that would take weeks,

replies.author: Richard
replies.text: I received everything I ordered in a very timely manner. There are people out there scamming donations, and products. You may have ordered them from a fictitious site. If you paid by credit card you may be able to contact the card company, to trace where your payment went, and take appropriate action. Good luck in your plight.
